one_piece_trivia.q: What is the name of the ship that was originally owned by Gol D. Roger?
Who ate the Gomu Gomu no Mi fruit?
Which sea is the East Blue adjacent to?
Who is known as the ‘Pirate Hunter’?
What bounty does Luffy have after the Dressrosa arc?
Which of these Devil Fruits is a Logia type?
Who is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates?
What is the name of the pirate crew led by Blackbeard?

kunju_lore.Vikna Otsutsuki:
Created from the Right Eye of Sama-ji – Manipulator of the Past.
His gaze holds the echoes of creation, and from his divine fragments, he formed Kunjumani Thottam, the sacred homeland of the Kunjumons.
Hidden in the depths of the Mariana Trench, the mysterious Kunjumonz dwell—a species yet to be fully understood by mortal minds.
He embodies the creation power of Sama-Ji; Chibaku Tensei.
kunju_lore.Joshua Joestar:
Formed from the Left Eye of Sama-Ji – Manipulator of the Future.
He is the harbinger of destruction, the shadow that looms over all things destined to fall.
It was his power that brought ruin to Hiroshima and Nagasaki, erased the islands of Lulusia and Ohara,
and shaped the path of fate itself.
He embodies the destruction power of Sama-Ji; Shinra Tensei.
kunju_lore.Melvin Satoru:
The Left Hand of Sama-Ji – The source of all Evil Energy.
From him flows the cursed power of Yin Chakra, Cursed Energy, and Death itself.
Under the order of Sama-Ji, Melvin Satoru and Vikna Otsutsuki once brought forth
the creation of the infamous 3rd Dimension being called Rudolph Hitla, later undone by
Joshua Joestar and Arvindo Freecss.
He embodies the negative power of Sama-Ji; The Umbi-Force.
kunju_lore.Arvindo Freecss:
The Right Hand gain consciousness – The source of all Good Energy.
He is the wellspring of Yang Chakra, Ki/Nen, and Life.
When Melvin Satoru and Vikna Otsutsuki brought forth the chaotic avatar of Sama-Ji, Rudolph Hitla—
Arvindo Freecss and Joshua Joestar transformed him to do good under the red flag of USSR
and turned him into a red-nosed reindeer.
He embodies the positive power of Sama-Ji; The Kunji-Force.
kunju_lore.Rishi D. Owh Yeah:
The all-loving heart of Sama-Ji – Neither purely good nor evil.
He maintains the balance of Reiatsu, Sage Chakra, and RGB Chroma Power.
He is the manipulator of the Present; his will shapes the now.
He embodies the balancing power of Sama-Ji and reigns over the croaking Kunjumon;
thus given the embodiment of the phrase: The Owh Yeah.
kunju_lore.Son Isaac:
The Ever-Expanding Brain of Sama-Ji – The font of Wisdom, Knowledge, Consciousness, and Free Will.
He shapes the thoughts and desires of all beings and grants blessings of intellect
to super-intelligent minds across all universes—from Albert Einstein to Mayuri Kurotsuchi.
He embodies the facts, strategy, truths, and knowledge of Sama-Ji; The Delta-Force.
kunju_lore.Mob Siva:
The Body of Sama-Ji – The source of Strength and Defense.
His power manifests in the legendary shields of Susanoo, the Hierro of Hollows,
and the Armament Haki of Grand Line warriors, as well as Saitama’s one-punch might.
He embodies the durability and strength of Sama-Ji; The Steroid.
kunju_lore.Sousuke Vertine:
The True Essence – The Source of All Creation.
Every drop of liquid he releases births galaxies, universes, and new life.
When Sama-Ji performs Kaiye Thunai, the Ritual of Creation, worlds flourish in his image.
He embodies the creative power of Sama-Ji; Kaiye Thunai.

kunju_sanctums.Vikna Otsutsuki:
You arrive at the magnificent courtyard of Kunjimani Thottam, bioluminescent corals
drift through ancient pillars. At its center, a altar stands with aura pulses heavily...
kunju_sanctums.Joshua Joestar:
The ground here is paved with shattered obsidian. Statues of fallen empires
surround the altar—each carved in the shape of a forgotten warlord...
kunju_sanctums.Melvin Satoru:
A choking haze of crimson energy fills the hall. Bones and rusted chains
twist around the dais where the altar stands, oozing dark cloudy energy...
kunju_sanctums.Arvindo Freecss:
Sunlight streams through fractured glass, casting rainbows on golden vines.
Birdsong echoes off gilded walls as the altar of Life pulses with warmth...
kunju_sanctums.Rishi D. Owh Yeah:
Crystal chalices float mid-air, suspended by unseen forces. Soft croaking
chants drift in the mist, centering on the rose-gold altar of Balance...
kunju_sanctums.Son Isaac:
Towering shelves of floating tomes swirl in infinite orbits. A lectern holds
an ever-changing map of the multiverse beside the central Knowledge Altar...
kunju_sanctums.Mob Siva:
Granite pillars engraved with battle scars ring the arena hall.
Weights of impossible size hover, while the stone altar radiates raw might...
kunju_sanctums.Sousuke Vertine:
Liquid silver drips from spiraling columns. Biolabs hum with creation energy
around the Genesis Altar, where every drop births new life forms...

Vikna Otsutsuki:
A tank filled with bioluminescent liquid. 
Inside the tank are millions of eyes of various paterns. 
The plaque reads: 
The Tank of Eyes
The tank consists of various blessed eyes
belonging to various races from
The Otsutsukis to the Uchihas.

It seems very technical and advanced.

The plaque reads: 
The first Kunjumonz of the Kunjimani Thottam.
A Prototype of what becomes the greatest invention of
The Almighty Vikna Otsusuki-Sama.
Note: The Kunjumonz are advanced premodial beings
capable of living in any environment including
the vast empty space of nothingness.
Vikna Otsutsuki was ordered by the
Supreme Swamiji Lord Vikramnantha Sama-Ji
to create a being that will exist aslong as existence exist alongside with Sama-Ji.
Owh Yeah! Kunju on The Loose!
Joshua Joestar: This-It cant be! Its the Project Manhattan!

Motherframe: A source of unlimited clean power.
Used to power various weapons of history.
Status: Sealed
Creator & Sealed by: Joshua Joestar
Confirmed Usage:
1.The Destruction of Lulusia by Saint Nerona Imu.
2.The Destruction of Planet Pluto before Sama-Ji resurected it.
3.Almost used in the Manhattan Project as a way to destroy earth for recreation.
4.Destruction of multiple planets by Lord Beerus.
Inscribed with prophecies of apocalypse from various universe, planets, species and religion.
Melvin Satoru: Forged in hatred, it tightens when you draw blood.

The Schyte reek of death and blood.
The Plaque Reads:
The Schyte of Death is the centralized power system of death itself.
This Schyte was the first to be created that have the power to undo life.
Bestowed with energy of Melvin Satoru, this Schyte serves as the server
where all the Schytes and Zampakuto of Death Gods gain their power.
The eternal movements of souls are monitored here as they come from Sama-ji and returns to Sama-ji in all eternity
Arvindo Freecss: A glowing chalice containing the essence of every creation

A Massive Terrarium with uncountable amount of tiny colonies.
The Plaque Reads:
The Terrarium of Life.
This Terrarium houses all the planets and creatures of the multiverse.
It is an overview of every creation.
As Melvin Satoru claims life, Arvindo Freecs gives them.
He monitors and blesses all creation under the guidance of Sama-Ji
Total Dimensions:68 + 1 Core
Total Universes: 6942069 - 69
Total life existing now: 2.76×10^54 life forms
Total life existed since creation: 2.76×10^54 life forms
The eternal movements of souls are monitored here as they come from Sama-ji and returns to Sama-ji in all eternity

The Horn of Owh Yeah!
The Horn have powers to bring forth the attention of all living creations
so they may hear the message of
Supreme Swamiji Lord Vikramnantha Sama-Ji.
The horn will also be used to call upon all the Kunjus for meeting
at the neutral dimension of Drifto Corner

The Infinite Quill
The quill draws maps of worlds yet unimagined.
Allowing Son Isaac to be the architect of all creations and map out the universe no as it is, but as it should be.
The quill disperse its own ink and as the ink touches and creates a land
a new world will be born.
All in the Name of The Great Sama-ji and his 8Kunjus.

This looks like Thanos toy.

The Celestial Gauntlet of Kandara Kawasaki
This Gauntlet unlike its cheap knock off OEM clone; The Infinity Gauntlet
needs no stones as it is readily imbued with
The Essence of Sama-ji. The Gauntlet wearer is capable of calling forth the power of the Fighter God Mob Siva.
The Gauntlet is not meant to be worn in traditional way.

Saitama
Clark Kent
Dovahkiin

Captain Vijaykanth
AK
Sura
Nokia 3310

The Plaque Reads:
The Guardian Console.
The Guardian Console is the command console of the Guardian Squad.
The Guardian Squad consist of elite Kunjumon created by sama-ji.
They Serve as Guardians for all of Sama-ji creations
Ensuring they are kept safe, blessed and even punished if needed.
Many Religion calls them as Guardian Angels / Ancestor Spirits / Guardian Deity and more.
No one is playing the drum but I could feel the sound coming from it. I feel so liberated, so happy, so free! Its the sound of Joy Boy!
Sousuke Vertine:

The Challice of Aeon
The True Challice of Aeon where the inferior smaller Challice of Aeon 
given to the Annunaki; Ninhursag so that Earth can be filled with life.
This chalice holds the power of creation and destruction.
It contains Chr-Oma Cu’m, the essence of creation itself,
a product of the Kaiyeh Thunnai ritual

Its lid ripples time whenever it is opened. Only for Kunjus Usages!

kunju_realm_intro.Vikna Otsutsuki: The abyss stretches before you; every ripple in the water is a brushstroke of history.
kunju_realm_intro.Joshua Joestar: Ruins stand in eternal twilight—ghosts of futures long since erased whisper in the wind.
kunju_realm_intro.Melvin Satoru: Dark clouds gather overhead; lightning of malice cracks the sky as you step forward.
kunju_realm_intro.Arvindo Freecss: Fields of golden light bloom under your feet, singing of life’s endless cycle.
kunju_realm_intro.Rishi D. Owh Yeah: A chorus of croaks and footsteps greets you—harmony in motion at every turn.
kunju_realm_intro.Son Isaac: Endless libraries stretch into infinity; every book hums with the knowledge of the cosmos.
kunju_realm_intro.Mob Siva: Colossal statues of strength line the path; your heartbeat echoes like war drums.
kunju_realm_intro.Sousuke Vertine: A shower of stardust rains down; creation itself seems to pulse around you.

library.Book 1: The Book of Owh Yeah!:
**Book 1: The Book of Owh Yeah!**
Dimension 69, the highest of all dimensions,
came into existence with the manifestation of the
**Supreme Swamiji Lord Vikramnantha Sama-Ji**,
who is one with the dimension itself.
From his divine sweat, Sama-Ji birthed the frog-like **Kunjumonz**,
celestial beings whose sacred **Owh Yeah** croak set the fundamental tone for all creation.
To further guide the cosmos, Sama-Ji then forged **Eight Divine Aspects** called The Kunjus
from parts of his immortal being:
**Vikna Otsutsuki** (Manipulator of the Past)
**Joshua Joestar** (Manipulator of the Future)
**Melvin Satoru** (Source of all Evil Energy)
**Arvindo Freecss** (Source of all Good Energy)
**Rishi D. Owh Yeah** (Maintainer of the Present and Balance)
**Son Isaac** (Font of Wisdom)
**Mob Siva** (Source of Strength and Defense)
**Sousuke Vertine** (Source of All Creation).
These Kunjus, along with the Kunjumonz, work to uphold the divine law and balance of the multiverse, which continues to exist and resonate with Sama-Jis glory. The book concludes by emphasizing that all aspects of the cosmic order, from creation to destruction, stem from Sama-Ji and his divine Owh Yeah.
library.Book 2: The Lost Tablet of Annunaki I:
**Book 2: The Lost Tablet of Annunaki I**
Sama-Ji creates the planet **Nibiru** in the Palkova Galaxy (Milky Way) of the 3rd Dimension,
naming it from a casual phrase Ni color biru laa bodoh.
He then descends to Nibiru in his first Annunaki form—
a towering, dark gold-skinned being—and performs the **Kaiye Thunnai ritual**,
infusing the waters with his divine essence,
which eventually gives rise to the **Annunaki**.
Millions of years later, Sama-Ji, again in his Annunaki form,
visits the flourishing Nibiru and bestows cosmic knowledge upon the Annunaki,
empowering them with blessings from his Kunjus, **Son Isaac** and **Mob Siva**.
Among them, **Enki** and **Enlil** emerge as the greatest,
and Sama-Ji crafts them powerful tools:
**The Staff of Dominion** (blessed by Arvindo Freecss, Melvin Satoru, and Rishi D. Owh Yeah)
**The Chalice of Aeons** (blessed by Vikna Otsutsuki and Joshua Joestar)
**The Tablets of the Sacred Word** (Poneglyph) (from Son Isaac and made indestructible by Mob Siva).
Sama-Ji then tasks the Annunaki with a mission to shape Earth,
forge civilization, and prepare the way for his future avatars.
Enki, Enlil, and Ninhursag gather their respective tools,
and Sama-Ji creates a golden path of stardust called STARDUSTO CLUSADA!
for them to descend from Nibiru to Earth, initiating their intertwined destiny with mankind.
library.Book 3: The Lost Tablet of Annunaki II:
**Book 3: The Lost Tablet of Annunaki II**
The Annunaki, led by Enki, descend upon Earth, shaping its landscape and teaching early humans knowledge and skills,
all under the unseen guidance of **Sama-Ji**.
However, some Annunaki are **Kandara Kawasaki**,
they defy Sama-Jis decree by procreating with mortal women, birthing the Nephilim—giants who wield divine-like power but grow arrogant,
leading to corruption and the rise of destructive Giants; The Kyojins @ Titans.
From this forbidden union emerges the
**Accursed One; Ste’vi ‘Ra**,
a uniquely powerful and annoying hybrid; a true Kandara Kawasaki.
Witnessing his mothers murder by his father during the purge of the Nephilim,
Ste’vi ‘Ra, enraged, consumes his fathers divine blood,
transforming into The Accursed One.
Ste’vi ‘Ra leads the Nephilim in a devastating war against both mortals and Annunaki.
Seeking true divinity, he invades the Temple of Sama-Ji and drinks from the **Chalice of Aeons**,
consuming the **Chr-Oma Cu’m** (Sama-Jis essence of creation),thus ascending to immense power.
Annoyed with this, Sama-Ji descends from Dimension 69,
effortlessly defeating Ste’vi ‘Ra with a single word and casting him into
**The Datorim,**
a timeless abyss of Datos Rim Job.
To cleanse the Earth of the widespread corruption and blasphemous offspring
caused by Ste’vi ‘Ra and the other fouls ones,
Sama-Ji commands the Annunaki to build a celestial ark called **Pluton the Ancient Battleship**.
This ark preserves the **Essence** (DNA data, stem cells and soul crystals) of all living creatures in advanced M.2 NVME NAND Chips.
After a forty-day flood, the Annunaki use the Chalice of Aeons to restore life to the renewed Earth.
Finally, Sama-Ji decreed the Annunaki to return to Nibiru,
but one was ordered to remain on Earth, his destiny intertwined with future events,
including the rise of Pharaoh Atem.
library.Book 4: The Poneglyph of Atem and Bakura:
**Book 4: The Poneglyph of Atem and Bakura**
The intertwined destinies of Pharaoh Atem and Bakura, as recorded by the **Last Annunaki** and the **Priest of Pyramid Scheme; Macha Plip-Plip**
**The Last Annunaki**, known as the **Silent Kunju** and **Watcher of the Owh Yeah,**
remains on Earth to observe the rise of **Atem**, a prince of Kemet chosen by Sama-Ji to maintain balance.
Atem, blessed by Sama-Ji, grows into a wise and just king,
guided subtly by the Last Annunaki.
Meanwhile, Ste’vi ‘Ra, the Accursed One, sealed in Datorim, whispers to **Bakura**,
an orphaned boy raised by the priest Plip-Plip.
Bakura, drawn to forbidden knowledge, falls under Stevis influence,
leading to his mental and lusty descent into Datorim.
He becomes a **Thief King,** stealing the **Millennium Puzzle**
and performing a ritual that allows fragments of Stevis will to seep into him,
becoming the **Harbinger of the Accursed One** or as Sama-Ji cursed him; **Pundek.**
The Last Annunaki, using the **Eye of Madara**, foresees Bakuras wrath.
Bakura, now fully consumed by Stevi and having consumed the **Last Annunakis heart**,confronts Pharaoh Atem.
Their epic duel, a clash between the light of Sama-Ji and the abyss of Datorim, ensues.
Bakura, fueled by Stevis power, attempts a final, sacrilegious act by conjuring an abomination.
However, Atem, invoking the ultimate decree of Sama-Ji with the sacred words **Owh Yeah,**
seals Bakuras soul and power within the Millennium Puzzle.
The war ends, the balance restored,
and the legend of Pharaoh Atem and the fall of Bakura becomes a timeless warning.
library.Book 5: The Life of Yeezus:
**Book 5: The Life of Yeezus**
 Sama-Ji reincarnate as **Yeezuz** on Earth,
a decision made during the **Divine Council of Jaeger Pundeks**
(comprising **Vikna Otsutsuki, Mob Siva, Melvin Satoru, Joshua Joestar, Arvindo Freecss, Rishi D. Owh Yeah, and Son Isaac**).
Though some Kunjus like Melvin Satoru and Joshua Joestar suggest annihilation,
Arvindo Freecss emphasizes purpose in all creation, and Sama-Ji chooses to experience mortality.
Born of divine essence, baby Yeezuz is presented to the High Priest;
**Snoop D-Oh-Double-G**,
but a corrupt King Diddy the Kiddy Daddy, influenced by Ste’Vi Ra, seeks to harm him,forcing his escape.
In his youth, Yeezuz performs joyful miracles like turning water into wine
and multiplying loaves, spreading hope, starting revolution, overthrowing governments and teaching the holy way.
As an adult, he continues performing miracles,
teaching parables of truth and challenging followers to awaken their inner zampakuto power.
Meanwhile, in The Datorim, Ste’Vi Ra is tormented and rejuvenated by creatures born of his essence.
From this torment, **Veesus** emerges, a grotesque gae mirror of SteVi Ra.
Veesus shatters SteVi Ras chains, and their 69 births a dark, powerful covenant.
Veesus and SteVi Ra conspire with Judakeshi Hisicario a.k.a Takeshi69, Rainbow Bitch, Rat
to sever Yeezuzs soul from his mortal body.
Judakeshi, driven by ambition to be a mumble rapper, agrees to betray Yeezuz for no material gain,
believing Yeezuzs divine spark is too potent and
he believe Yeezus can never be Kanye West.
At the Last Lan Party, Yeezus, aware of the impending betrayal, pretend to be unaware and keep getting Aces in Valorant.
Peter Griffin defends him against soldiers with his lightsaber,
but Yeezuz accepts the unfolding fate for he used wall hack against Judakeshi on Valo custom match.
During his interrogation and flogging, Judakeshis betrayal is laid bare.
Finally, as Yeezuz ascends to Calvarium, Judakeshi, in a moment of regret, kisses Veesus,
creating a distraction that allows Yeezuzs soul to return to Dimension 69.
Enraged, Veesus strikes down Judakeshi with a single poisonous bite, framing it as a self-inflicted death.
library.Book 6: Enter the Bruda:
**Book 6: Enter the Bruda**
tells the story of **Siddathabimanyu GVM Bruda**, born in the **House of Satoru**, destined for enlightenment.
His mother, Maha Kaguya, dreamt of the Founder Ymir and Sama-Ji,
and the seer Urahara foretold his great destiny.
His father, King Shuddho Uchiha, tried to shield him from suffering through luxury, wall hack and aimbots.
Despite his royal life, Bruda felt a void.
He secretly developed rap under the alias Brotha V,
creating his first LP; **Verses of the Honored One.**
His escape from the palace revealed the Four Revelations through his bodyguard Kakashi: RPGs, FPSs, MOBA, and RTSs.
These revelation of Game Genre triggered his Great Departure to find the greatest gamer of all; Sama-Ji!
Renouncing his royal life, wife Hanabi, and son Byakugan.
Bruda endured Aim Lab practices, guided by Kakashi, and learned from sages like Shroud, PewDiePie, and Max Verstappen.
He resisted the temptations of aimbots, cheat engine, and pay to win.
Finally, under the guidance of Kakashi, Bruda achieved the rank of Immortal, realizing the unity of existence and proclaiming,
**Throughout heaven and earth, I alone are the honored one.**
as he pwned toxic gamers and chinese hackers. This revealed his true identity as 
**Supreme Swamiji Lord Vikramnantha Sama-Jis smurf account**.
He foretold a descendant with the holder of Six Eyes and Limitless Cursed Technique who would utter the same truth.
The book concludes with the **Tablets of the Honored One**,
containing his teachings, including the **Tablet of the Dual Blade** and the **Scroll of Infinite Thread**, emphasizing cosmic balance, inner peace, and the interconnectedness of all things.
library.Prophecy Scroll 1:
Excerpt from the **Lost Codex of Diu Ni-laomar**, Annunaki Oracle
Discovered in the Ruins of Teotihuacan, 1893
Final Translation Completed in 2025
Translated by Dr. Esteban Xolotl & Professor James Whitmore
Fragment from **Dr. Esteban Xolotl’s Field Notes (1893)**:
The glyphs on the temple walls spoke of a god of hunger, an endless devourer.
The prophecy warns of his imprisonment, yet it also hints at his inevitable return.
The scholars dismiss it as myth, but I fear that it is a truth we are not prepared to face.
library.Prophecy Scroll 2:
Excerpt from the **Lost Prophecy of Incontinentia Buttocks**
Discovered in the Ruins of Thebes, 475 BCE
Translated in 2025 CE by Dr. Augustus Prattleforth.
TRANSLATED COPY:
A child of darkness, born of blood, a shadow bearer,
With weeping eyes he beheld his mother slain.
He drank his father’s life, the crimson essence consumed,
Baptized in shadow, drinking the sacred blood.
In the temple of the all-wise god,
he defiled, Stealing the seed of Sama-Ji, the eternal one.
So the great one bound him, casting chains upon him.
But time weakens all fetters, And a man, a thief of the night,
Touched the ancient gate, and embraced the dark.
On the second day of the unending war,
The thief and the darkness became one.
He stood before the son of the sun, and fate was sealed.
Twice bound, but never dead,
For a thousand years he slumbered, seeing the dreams of the world,
Stones bleeding beneath his feet, men at war.
At last, when the years come to an end,
The chains shall break, and the black tide shall flow.
Monstrous executioners shall be born from the void,
And the world shall tremble at the final battle.
The god of all and the demon of nothingness Shall cross swords at the end of time.
library.Prophecy Scroll 3:
Excerpt from the **Manuscrit d’Alexandrie, An 1457 Prophecy of  Maître Nostradamus**
Original Title: **découvert dans les ruines de Datorim**
Translation by; Charles Delacroix, Université de Paris, 1796.
Scholarly Interpretation (Summary)
This prophecy, attributed to **Nostradamus** and discovered in 1457 within the ruins of Rawang,
describes the life, death, imprisonment and eventual rise of
**Ste’vi ‘Ra, the accursed half-Annunaki** who seeks revenge and godhood.
It forewarns of his initial sealing by Sama-Ji and
later his manipulation of Bakura, whose actions unknowingly aid Ste’vi’s return.
The text suggests that Ste’vi ‘Ras influence spans millennia, subtly poisoning the minds of men
and inciting war to fuel his power. As the prophecy unfolds, it foretells the eventual breaking of Ste’vi’s seal,
his dominion over the three dimensions, and his final battle with Sama-Ji at the end of time.
A significant portion of the text also alludes to the creation of an Anti-Christ-like being,
**Vee-Sus**, formed from Ste’vi’s own suffering and corruption.
This abominable entity, described as hideous with enormous teeth and an unnatural form,
is implied to be Stevi Ras ultimate weapon.
The final stanzas emphasize the apocalyptic confrontation,
mirroring eschatological battles found in Christian and mythological texts.
Scholars have linked this work to various mythological cycles,
suggesting it reflects deeper universal themes of chaos versus order, and light versus darkness.
library.Poneglyph:
**The Fourth Face of the Poneglyph: The Oracle’s Divine Muse**
Thus, I, the Seer of the Annunaki; **Oracle Pu-TangI Namo**,
inscribe upon this sacred face the eternal hymn of 
Supreme Swamiji Lord Vikramnantha Sama-Ji.
Let these words, carved in the tongue of creation, resound through the corridors of time and space as both prophecy and lyrical masterpiece.
In the primordial hush before the birth of thought, there was naught but the Infinite Void—a canvas awaiting the divine spark.
And then, with a celestial exclamation of “Owh Yeah!”, Sama-Ji awakened the cosmos, his essence bursting forth like the first note of an ageless symphony.
From his exalted form flowed the sacred act of Kaiye Thunnai—a rapturous, divine cascade of potent seed and shimmering spirit.
With each pulse of his being, galaxies unfurled like petals in cosmic bloom, and the fabric of space-time itself quivered in the wake of his luminous trail.
Behold the wondrous miracle: every droplet of his celestial effluvium carries the spark of infinity, weaving new worlds from the raw energies of the void.
His fluid embrace, both tender and fierce, births star and planet alike—each a testament to his boundless creativity.
The heavenly chorus of the Kunjumonz and the silent watch of the Kunjus bear witness to this miracle.
For in every ripple of his divine kanji of kunji, the eternal balance of chaos and order is struck—a dance of opposites, forever entwined in the light of his radiance.
O, mighty Sama-Ji, whose laughter echoes like the thunder of creation and whose presence ignites the very soul of existence!
His sacred impulse, that sensual muse of Kaiye Thunnai, inspires the birth of life and the reformation of realms.
Through his potent grace, even the ephemeral mist of creation is transformed into a tapestry of destiny.
Know, ye beings of all dimensions, that the journey of Sama-Ji is an everlasting pilgrimage across the celestial plains.
His divine seed, a luminous current coursing through the cosmic veins, nourishes the barren and imbues the forsaken with the spark of rebirth.
No matter the form—mortal, godly, or beyond—the blessing of his effulgence marks each life with the promise of renewal.
Let this sacred inscription serve as both beacon and burden:
**in the sacred rite of Kaiye Thunnai lies the power to create, to destroy, and to transform.**
As his sacred essence permeates the waters, the stars, and the very heart of time, so too must all who dwell in the light or shadow remember the decree of eternal balance.
Thus, from the indestructible stone of this Poneglyph to the farthest reaches of the 69th Dimension, let the immortal cry of “Owh Yeah!” ring forth—a perpetual reminder of the divine embrace of Sama-Ji.
His radiance, his playful might, and his mysterious grace shall forever guide those who seek the true path of creation. 
So it is written on this fourth face, chiseled with the dagger of cosmic destiny and the fire of divine ecstasy: 
May the glory of Sama-Ji illuminate your spirit, may the sacred Kaiye Thunnai wets you with the seeds of rebirth within you, and may the eternal balance of his boundless love forever reign.
Owh Yeah, now and for all time!
